title: Cant Install League
body: I tried to install league of legends patch 7.6 but it would stop at around 1% and say update failed for an unknown reason. so i tried to uninstall the game and then reinstall it but each time it gets to around 71% it just says update failed and im pretty sure i tried almost everything.  Please help!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body:
If your install is getting stuck at around 70%, it's typically a sign that your network's connection to our patching servers is unstable. While your own internet can be in tip-top shape, sometimes your connection to a specific server can be spotty. When that happens, it can make it hard for your patcher to download all the files it needs.

Check out our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can get that client updated!

I have overcame that problem but i m on a new one i can get my league client download to 99% and then it stay there i have tried everything that i can think of... besides getting new internet. sooo i am not entirely sure what to do at this point/

Since you've already tried that connection guide and it only got you up to 99%, let's get you some one on one help so that we can look a little deeper into your patching issue. 

Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help you get that install going!
